definition: to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate
10th earthly branch: 5-7 p.m., 8th solar month (8th September-7th October), year of the Rooster/ancient Chinese compass point: 270° (west)
self/oneself/sixth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/sixth in order/letter "F" or Roman "VI" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/hexa
matching/fitting in with/compatible with/to correspond/to fit/to conform to/rapport/to coordinate with/to act in concert with/to cooperate/to become man and wife/to combine parts of machine
to deploy/to allocate/configuration/allocation
to distribute/to assign/to allocate/to partition (a hard drive)
to form a complete set/compatible/matching/complementary
to allocate/to provide/to outfit with
to pair up/to match/to arrange in pairs/to add sth into a group
component/part/fitting/accessory/replacement part
to ration merchandise (esp. food in times of shortages)
quota/ration
to control/to dominate/to allocate
to mate or marry/to match/matching/compatible
to put together an order and deliver it (i.e. 配貨|配货[pei4 huo4] and 送貨|送货[song4 huo4])/to deliver (goods)
prescription/cooking recipe/formulation/completing the square (to solve quadratic equation, math.)
consort/mate/spouse
dubbing (filmmaking)

sentences.english: Yes, I would like to buy a pair of dress shoes.
sentences.chinese: 好啊，我想买一双配洋装的鞋。
你可以配一枚新钥匙吗？

sentences.english: It is worth popularizing as a new type undersurface layer gradation of asphalt pavement.
sentences.chinese: 是一种值得推广的新型沥青路面下面层级配。

sentences.english: The coding procedure can be repeated up to 4 times for additional remotes.
sentences.chinese: 这个程序可以进行4次，也就是说可以配4个遥控器。

sentences.english: That cover belongs to this jar.
Rib Eye, with Roasted Provencal Potatoes, Spinach Cream and Vegetable Ragout.
sentences.chinese: 肉眼牛肉，配香草烤土豆，奶油菠菜和烩蔬菜。

sentences.english: Hot cars and pretty girls may go well together, but don't be distracted by them.
sentences.chinese: 香车配美女，但是不要因为她们分神。

sentences.english: In the garden there are some stone tables with several wooden armchairs around each.
sentences.chinese: 花园里有一些石桌子，每个桌子配了几把椅子。

sentences.english: Rhodium-plated hair clip with Jonquil crystal lemon and leaf in Peridot crystal.
sentences.chinese: 淡黄色的水晶柠檬配橄榄色的叶子，金属部分镀铑。

sentences.english: I need some new shoes to go with these pants.
sentences.chinese: 我需要双新靯来配这条裤子。

sentences.english: He likes to have rice and pickles for meals.
He let her feast on the cracker with strawberry jam.
sentences.chinese: 他给饼干配上草莓果酱，让内奥米美食一餐。

sentences.english: She is crazy, How can she deserve such jade pendant feather fan？
sentences.chinese: 她一个疯子，也配使用这样的玉坠羽扇吗？

sentences.english: Beef and Chicken Sate, Peanut Soy Sauce, Pressed Rice Cake, Cucumber Pickles.
sentences.chinese: 沙爹鸡肉，牛肉，配花生酱油米饼及酸黄瓜。

sentences.english: Heels also look a lot better with pencil skirts than with trousers flapping around them.
sentences.chinese: 高跟鞋配铅笔裙也要比配罩在四周的裤子好看的。

sentences.english: In addtion, it is helpful for battery manufacturers to classify cells in battery assembling.
sentences.chinese: 提高电池的一致性，解决电池配组分级困难的问题。

black

white/fig. reactionary/anti-communist
